commodore
=========

Manage and maintain your user's scripts and tools

Installation
------------

From the project root directory::

    $ python setup.py install

Usage
-----

Simply run it::

    $ commodore

Use --help/-h to view info on the arguments::

    $ commodore --help

Release Notes
-------------

:0.1.0:
    commodore create, edit, delete works
:0.0.1:
    Project created
